metadata.title: CVE-2024-26882 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:ip_tunnel: make sure to pull inner header in ip_tunnel_rcv() Apply the samefix than ones found in : 8d975c15c0cd ("ip6_tunnel: make sure to pull innerheader in __ip6_tnl_rcv()") 1ca1ba465e55 ("geneve: make sure to pull innerheader in geneve_rx()") We have to save skb->network_header in a temporaryvariable in order to be able to recompute the network_header pointer aftera pskb_inet_may_pull() call. pskb_inet_may_pull() makes sure the neededheaders are in skb->head. syzbot reported: BUG: KMSAN: uninit-value
